Biden welcomes Pope decision to allow blessings for same-sex couplesU.S. President Joe Biden welcomed the decision by Pope Francis to allow Roman Catholic priests to administer blessings to same-sex couples as long as they are not part of regular Church rituals or liturgies, White House spokesperson Karine Jean Pierre said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:58:14 GMT Q7QYYG4MUFIXZDMUGWJMBKXCIM https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-welcomes-pope-decision-allow-blessings-same-sex- Couples-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Ex-Haitian senator sentenced to life in prison over president's assassinationFormer Haitian Senator John Joel Joseph was on Tuesday sentenced in a Miami court to life in prison over his role in the July 2021 assassination of Haiti's last president, Jovenel Moise. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:50:53 GMT TKQOVJMY4NNDHHUTEK5WT63EFI https://www.reuters.com/world/ex-haitian-senator-sentenced-life-prison-over-presidents-assassination-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Thousands of Slovaks continue protesting government's criminal law reformsAt least 15,000 people demonstrated in Slovakia's capital on Tuesday as protests grew against plans of Prime Minister Robert Fico's government to fast-track criminal law changes that include scrapping a special prosecutor's office focused on corruption. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:44:11 GMT 3JFHT6GWNRMADKPVLYDXWX6C6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thousands-slovaks-continue-protesting-governments-criminal-law-reforms-2023-12-19/Radovan Stoklasa世界欧洲
EU, US urge Serbia to address concerns about electoral processThe European Union and the United States urged Serbia to address concerns about its electoral process after independent observers found worrying irregularities including vote buying during Sunday's snap election. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:32:49 GMT M7HEDH6SXBPDHDIKGQEZB6FG5A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-us-urge-serbia-address-concerns-about-electoral-process-2023-12-19/Daphne Psaledakis, Kanishka Singh世界欧洲
Zelenskiy hopes for speedier prisoner exchanges with RussiaUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Tuesday that a recent slowdown in prisoner swaps with Moscow was due to unspecified "reasons" on the Russian side, but expressed hope that the swaps could soon resume. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:13:13 GMT FWH4PBEUXJJDTE3PPG3OSOGFNI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-hopes-speedier-prisoner-exchanges-with-Russia-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine to produce one million drones next year, Zelenskiy saysUkraine will produce one million drones next year, boosting current production levels, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:03:34 GMT HOZSMLIGQJJZDJ3KNKMORJNWM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-product-one-million-drones-next-year-zelenskiy-says-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
New Zealand's Luxon to talk defence, economy in AustraliaNew Zealand’s new prime minister, Christopher Luxon, said he will discuss economic ties, defence and shared interests in the Indo-Pacific region during talks with his Australian counterpart Anthony Albanese in Sydney on Wednesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:02:23 GMT 2LPUIGOPONOPBFU37A6YDB5ECU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zeallands-luxon-talk-defence-economy-australia-2023-12-19/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
Italy court hands lifetime sentence to Pakistani parents in 'honour killing' caseAn Italian court sentenced two parents to lifetime imprisonment on Tuesday for killing their teenage daughter after she refused to travel to Pakistan for an arranged marriage. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:36:48 GMT 7GXQXWIBVRIVBNQBDMISJTFSYI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-court-hands-lifetime-sentence-pakistani-parents-honour-killing-case-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
President Weah steps in to reverse Liberia's U.N. vote against Gaza ceasefireLiberian President George Weah has intervened to reverse his country's vote against a U.N. resolution calling for a ceasefire in the Gaza Strip, the West African nation's information ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:18:45 GMT RCB5JXD6T5MLFLDL536VF4XARU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/president-weah-steps-reverse-liberias-un-vote-against-gaza-ceasefire-2023-12-19/Reuters世界非洲
High civilian toll in Gaza is cost of crushing Hamas, Israeli military officials sayHeavy civilian casualties are the cost of Israel's intense campaign to destroy Hamas in Gaza and the militants' urban warfare strategy, Israeli military officials said, in the face of global alarm at the staggering toll from the bombing. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:08:09 GMT ZSN3MJSL55PLZFAZVVT3S5XVXA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/high-civilian-toll-gaza-is-cost-crushing-hamas-israeli-military-officials-say-2023-12-19/Frank Daniel世界中东
Iraq's ruling Shi'ite alliance leads in provincial elections -initial resultsParties that make up Iraq's Shi'ite ruling alliance together took the single largest bloc of votes in Baghdad and most of the country's southern provinces in provincial council elections, a Reuters tally of preliminary results showed. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:02:58 GMT NWQUDK5IPVPVPJHRI4NNBR7QNM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iraqs-ruling-shiite-alliance-leads-provincial-elections-preliminary-results-2023-12-19/Ahmed Rasheed, Timour Azhari世界中东
Qatar, Israel hostage talks 'positive' but deal not imminent -sourceA meeting of Qatar’s premier and the heads of the Israeli Mossad spy agency and U.S. Central Intelligence Agency on Monday on steps to free further hostages held by Hamas was positive but no deal is imminent, a source briefed on the diplomatic efforts said. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:28:01 GMT XSLAR6BR7FOOZK2PYZQGIAY22M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/qatar-israel-hostage-talks-positive-deal-not-imminent-source-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Azerbaijan says border issues shouldn't get in way of peace deal with ArmeniaAzerbaijan sees no major obstacles to securing a lasting peace treaty with its neighbour Armenia and believes the question of defining their borders can be resolved separately, a senior Azerbaijani official said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 15:10:47 GMT R7EJMKAKOVIV3GA5DUKCCPMAWY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/azerbaijan-says-border-issues-shouldnt-get-way-peace-deal-with-armenia-2023-12-19/Alexander Marrow世界欧洲
Israel's Herzog floats second Gaza truce for recovering hostagesIsraeli President Isaac Herzog signalled readiness on the part of the country on Tuesday to enter another foreign-mediated Gaza truce in order to recover hostages held by Hamas and enable more aid to reach the besieged Palestinian enclave. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:19:48 GMT CFEVMJDGXRKC7A45773PMLXUVM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-herzog-floats-second-gaza-truce-recovering-hostages-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Russian former soldier wants to testify to ICC over war crimes witnessedA former Russian soldier has sought asylum in the Netherlands and wants to testify at the International Criminal Court (ICC) about war crimes by Russia that he witnessed while fighting in Ukraine, a Dutch legal source told Reuters on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 13:07:47 GMT HWR4VMNEDRL7JD6CDSRSNHNFEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-former-soldier-wants-testify-icc-over-war-crimes-witnessed-2023-12-19/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
Iceland volcano unlikely to impact flights; lava flows away from townLava spewing from a volcano in Iceland appeared to be flowing away from the only nearby town and the intensity of the eruption was dropping, offering hope that homes would be safe even though seismic activity could last months, officials said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:43:41 GMT YXXIA4L2MVKKNANGP5JRKHMRWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/large-icelandic-volcano-eruption-misses-local-town-2023-12-19/Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen, Tom Little世界欧洲
Shippers mask positions, weigh options amid Red Sea attacksA number of container ships are anchored in the Red Sea and others have turned off tracking systems as traders adjust routes and prices in response to maritime attacks by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on the world's main East-West trade route. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:22:56 GMT 4WPTDGZBHRITTCN6W5FZGAYRRM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/shippers-mask-positions-weigh-options-amid-red-sea-attacks-2023-12-19/Florence Tan, Lisa Barrington世界中东
Israel keeps pounding Gaza, Houthis vow more Red Sea attacksIsraeli forces pounded the shattered Gaza Strip on Tuesday while Yemen's Houthis vowed to defy a U.S.-led naval mission and keep targeting Red Sea shipping in support of the Palestinian enclave's ruling Hamas movement. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:52:02 GMT 6NF7X2O6IZIPNM64HF7XN7DDNI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/joint-patrols-guard-ships-response-attacks-by-houthis-backing-palestinians-2023-12-18/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud世界中东
US launches Red Sea force as ships reroute to avoid attacksThe United States on Tuesday launched a multinational operation to safeguard commerce in the Red Sea as attacks by Iran-backed Yemeni militants forced major shipping companies to reroute, stoking fears of sustained disruptions to global trade. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:34:39 GMT SQCWCA3E6ZJTHDRUZQGZYT4ETA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-launches-new-multinational-operation-safeguard-red-sea-commerce-2023-12-18/Phil Stewart, John Davison世界中东
Homes collapse as earthquake kills more than 100 in China's rural GansuA magnitude-6.2 earthquake struck one of China's poorest regions just before midnight on Monday, killing at least 127 people, injuring hundreds and bringing down mud houses in remote villages that never stood a chance. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 16:15:04 GMT KRMKMBYCSRM2RFHPPGYYAFHFGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/magnitude-61-earthquake-strikes-qinghai-china-emsc-2023-12-18/Liz Lee, Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo世界中国
